Name: RetainerTrack Expanded
Author: SicakBirTebessum, Liza Carvelli
Description: Keeps track of players and who a retainer belongs to. Alt characters can also be tracked if they have been seen before. --Currently only for whitelisted players.
Changelog:
- The player detail window now includes location history and customization history.
- My Characters & Privacy tab is added to the Config window.
- Option to log in with a Discord account is added.
- More statistical information is added to the User Info tab.
